t: I*pn give you thanks, O Lord,*s with my whole heart; before*ld the gods I sing your praise;
I*ln bow down toward your holy temple and*ld give thanks to your name for your steadfast love and your faithfulness, for*ld you have exalted above all things your*ld name and your word.
On*ln the day I called, you answered me; my*ld strength of soul you increased.
All*pn the kings of the earth shall give you thanks, O Lord,*s for*ld they have heard the words of your mouth,
and*ln they shall sing of the ways of the Lord,*s for*ld great is the glory of the Lord.*s
For*ln though the Lord*s is high, he regards the lowly, but*ld the haughty he knows from afar.
Though*pn I walk in the midst of trouble, you*ld preserve my life; you*ln stretch out your hand against the wrath of my enemies, and*ld your right hand delivers me.
The*ln Lord*s will fulfill his purpose for me; your*ld steadfast love, O Lord,*s endures forever. Do*ld not forsake the work of your hands.
